data.title: Bible College & Seminary in D.C. – LBC
data.meta_description: Earn your undergraduate, seminary, graduate, or doctoral degree at LBC | Capital. Our Washington,, D.C. location is conveniently located in Greenbelt, MD.
data.text:
Continue Your Education Journey at LBC | Capital

You have a unique, God-given calling on your life. Gain the resources you need to carry out that calling by enrolling at Lancaster Bible College | Capital Seminary & Graduate School. Through our Washington, D.C. location, LBC | Capital provides practical, Bible-based education for those in ministry, the workplace or government. See how LBC | Capital can come alongside and support you as you pursue your calling.

Check Out Our Open House Events

– See the Schedule! –

Programs Offered at Our Washington, D.C., Location

Whether you are looking to finish your degree or prepare for your next step in ministry or the workforce, we have a program that’s right for you. Our hybrid approach to undergraduate, seminary and graduate courses means your courses can fit within your schedule.
